languages.text: "Я уверен{mf||а}, что сенешаль действовал в рамках полномочий, но я готов{mf||а} лично удостовериться в разумности его решений".

traits.locale_text: "Я уверен{mf||а}, что сенешаль действовал в рамках полномочий, но я готов{mf||а} лично удостовериться в разумности его решений".

languages.text: "I am certain the Seneschal was acting within his authority, but I will verify the soundness of his decisions for myself."
languages.original_text: "Я уверен{mf||а}, что сенешаль действовал в рамках полномочий, но я готов{mf||а} лично удостовериться в разумности его решений".

traits.locale_text: "I am certain the seneschal was acting within his authority, but I will verify the soundness of his decisions for myself."
"I am certain the seneschal was acting within his authority, but I will verify the soundness of his decisions for myself."
"I am certain the seneschal was acting within his authority, but I will verify the soundness of his decisions for myself."
"I am certain the Seneschal was acting within his authority, but I will verify the soundness of his decisions for myself."

languages.text: “我相信总领是在他的权限之内行事，但我准备亲自检查他的决定是否合理。”
languages.original_text: "I am certain the Seneschal was acting within his authority, but I will verify the soundness of his decisions for myself."

traits.locale_text: “我相信总领是在他的权限之内行事，但我准备亲自检查他的决定是否合理。”

languages.text: «No me cabe duda de que el Senescal actuaba dentro de sus competencias, pero verificaré sus decisiones personalmente».
languages.original_text: "I am certain the Seneschal was acting within his authority, but I will verify the soundness of his decisions for myself."

traits.locale_text: «No me cabe duda de que el Senescal actuaba dentro de sus competencias, pero verificaré sus decisiones personalmente».

languages.text: 「家令長が権限の範囲内で行動していたのは確かだが、その判断の正当性を確認するのは私だ」
languages.original_text: "I am certain the Seneschal was acting within his authority, but I will verify the soundness of his decisions for myself."

traits.locale_text: 「家令長が権限の範囲内で行動していたのは確かだが、その判断の正当性を確認するのは私だ」

languages.text: "Der Truchsess hat gewiss im Rahmen seiner Zuständigkeit gehandelt, doch ich werde mich selbst von der Korrektheit seiner Entscheidungen überzeugen."
languages.original_text: "I am certain the Seneschal was acting within his authority, but I will verify the soundness of his decisions for myself."

traits.locale_text: "Der Truchsess hat gewiss im Rahmen seiner Zuständigkeit gehandelt, doch ich werde mich selbst von der Korrektheit seiner Entscheidungen überzeugen."

languages.text: « Je suis {mf|certain|certaine} que le sénéchal n'a pas abusé de son autorité, mais je m'assurerai par moi-même du bien-fondé de ses décisions. »
languages.original_text: "I am certain the Seneschal was acting within his authority, but I will verify the soundness of his decisions for myself."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis {mf|certain|certaine} que le sénéchal n'a pas abusé de son autorité, mais je m'assurerai par moi-même du bien-fondé de ses décisions. »

languages.text: "Seneşal'in yetkisi dâhilinde hareket ettiğinden şüphem yok. Fakat kararlarının doğruluğunu tasdik etmek isterim."
languages.original_text: "I am certain the Seneschal was acting within his authority, but I will verify the soundness of his decisions for myself."

traits.locale_text: "Seneşal'in yetkisi dâhilinde hareket ettiğinden şüphem yok. Fakat kararlarının doğruluğunu tasdik etmek isterim."
